channel.title: Picking Toy Locks
channel.description:
Have you ever seen those gay toy locks on diaries? Most people just keep the key attacked to the lock :P but some people hide it under their pillow or something =/ I once got this little money bank thing with a lock like that. I had ~$100 in it, and I lost the damn key -.- (It's tiny) So I decided to try to pick it :P To my surprise it was pretty easy ;)
SOOOooOoooO, I decided to make this tutorial to help people that lost their key, or people that want to spy on their 7yr old sisters diary =/
--
[size=11pt]You need:[/size]
[ul][li]A normal-sized paperclip[/li][/ul]
[img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/6454/lock1ch3.jpg[/img]
[ul][li]The lock you want to pick[/li][/ul]
[img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/4365/lock2ai4.jpg[/img]
-- IMPORTANT: IN SOME BROWSERS YOU NEED TO MANUALLY GO TO: http://www.imageupload.com/uploads/776fe_lock1.gif http://www.imageupload.com/uploads/f0f7b_lock2.gif FOR THE GIFS TO LOAD. JUST GO THERE FOR 1SEC AND CLOSE THE WINDOW (you don't need to let it load, it'll load here)
How to do it: [size=8pt]NOTE: It might take a while for the gifs to load :P (but be patient, it took me about 30min to get it all working =/)[/size]
1) First, get the paperclip in your hand. Unbend the whole thing so that the small, inside, U is on one side, and the Big U is on the other. Bend the small U so the two ends meet (kinda like this: [u]/\[/u]).
[img]http://www.imageupload.com/uploads/776fe_lock1.gif[/img]
2) Bend the other Big U to form some sort of handle (doesn't matter how, just make a handle). Put the small [u]/\[/u] shaped U into the lock. Slowly turn with the handle you made. It might take a few tries (it will), but keep on trying (put in, turn, slowly take out). Eventually the lock will click :)
[img]http://www.imageupload.com/uploads/f0f7b_lock2.gif[/img]
Have fun spying on little girls! :P

item.title: Picking Toy Locks
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

What’s the point in diaries? You write stuff down but never read it…It’s liek you’re ASKING somebody to break it open and read it.

Read full topic

item.title: Picking Toy Locks
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Have you ever seen those gay toy locks on diaries? Most people just keep the key attacked to the lock but some people hide it under their pillow or something =/
I once got this little money bank thing with a lock like that. I had ~$100 in it, and I lost the damn key -.- (It’s tiny) So I decided to try to pick it To my surprise it was pretty easy

SOOOooOoooO, I decided to make this tutorial to help people that lost their key, or people that want to spy on their 7yr old sisters diary =/

–

[size=11pt]You need:[/size]

[ul][li]A normal-sized paperclip[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]The lock you want to pick[/li][/ul]

–
IMPORTANT: IN SOME BROWSERS YOU NEED TO MANUALLY GO TO:
http://www.imageupload.com/uploads/776fe_lock1.gif
http://www.imageupload.com/uploads/f0f7b_lock2.gif
FOR THE GIFS TO LOAD. JUST GO THERE FOR 1SEC AND CLOSE THE WINDOW (you don’t need to let it load, it’ll load here)

How to do it:
[size=8pt]NOTE: It might take a while for the gifs to load (but be patient, it took me about 30min to get it all working =/)[/size]

  1. First, get the paperclip in your hand. Unbend the whole thing so that the small, inside, U is on one side, and the Big U is on the other.
    Bend the small U so the two ends meet (kinda like this: [u]/[/u]).

  1. Bend the other Big U to form some sort of handle (doesn’t matter how, just make a handle).
    Put the small [u]/[/u] shaped U into the lock. Slowly turn with the handle you made. It might take a few tries (it will), but keep on trying (put in, turn, slowly take out). Eventually the lock will click

Have fun spying on little girls!
